headline: International Flavors & Fragrances (NYSE:IFF) Launches $1.8 Billion Debt Tender Offers, Declares Dividend
summary: International Flavors & Fragrances (NYSE:IFF) announced its intention to purchase up to $1.8 billion of certain outstanding notes, which could reflect a strategic move to manage its debt obligations. This announcement coincided with a weekly price increase of 1.6% for IFF's stock, echoing broader market gains of 1.8%. The tender offers might have added weight to broader market movements driven by positive global trade talks and strong U.S. job data. Meanwhile, IFF's quarterly dividend...

headline: IFF Announces Tender Offers for Certain Outstanding Series of Notes
summary: NEW YORK, May 02, 2025--IFF (NYSE: IFF) announced today the commencement of tender offers to purchase for cash certain of its outstanding series of notes listed in the tables below (collectively, the "Notes") for an aggregate purchase price, excluding accrued and unpaid interest, of up to $1.8 billion.
